title: Game won't launch when clicking "Launch".
body:
Today I closed and reopened my client to patch it and upon finishing the patch I click launch, although when I did this nothing happens. I hear the "tink" noise as normal. about 30 seconds after clicking launch the TOS comes up asking me to accept or decline, I click accept and wait for 30 minutes and nothing. It never goes any further. I click launch over and over and just get loads of delayed TOS. If I click to repair the client it does nothing.

I reinstalled LoL. Still nothing. I already run it as administrator, as I've done this for years. I haven't installed any new programs. All my windows updates/flash/adobe air and everything else is up to date upon checking. I'm using windows 8.1, not the new windows 10. This is an issue with the LoL client.

replies.body: I have the same problem. Re-installed yesterday and it took a  good 30-45 mins before it even started patching.

Same Problem. Click Launch and nothing becomes activated. I have tried reinstalling, using compatibility modes, running as admin. This is becoming a major issue, as it has been almost 3 weeks with no fix.

OS: Windows 10 Pro
AV: BitDefender 2015

RIOT get it together, there are several threads with the same problem.
